text: Jean Dieudonné Deneux (bef. 17491786) was a painter from Liège, current Belgium. He is most notable for his flower paintings. Deneux's father, Henri Deneux, apprenticed Dieudonné to the atelier of "Coclers" (probably Jean- Georges-Christian Coclers) for three years on 15 August 1749. ==Sources== Category:18th-century painters from the Principality of Liège Category:1786 deaths Category:People from Liège
title: Dieudonné Deneux
